title: Din no Monshou (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Magic   Maids   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong
author: Akamaki Taruto
description:
Our unfortunate hero died due to an unfortunate accident that occurred while he was looking for a job.

When he woke up he realized that he had reincarnated in another world.

“I will never live a lazy life again.”

Then, he began his new life with that resolution in mind.

The place where he was born was in the house of a family of fallen nobles. Whatever they are.

This is the story of a boy who would fight to save his house from ruin with his companions>
